messages.subject: from the mouths of babes
messages.msgSnippet: One of the moms on a local list just posted this from her daughter. I thought y all might enjoy it too. ~Kelly *****The first year we had all the kids out of
messages.messageBody:
One of the moms on a local list just posted this from her daughter. I
thought y'all might enjoy it too.

~Kelly

*****The first year we had all the kids out of school a lady at church asked
S. how she liked having school at home... S. said " Actually my mother
has FINALLY gotten smart enough that she STOPPED having 'school at home' and
started letting us actually LEARN" Hmm this kid's gonna do great things
one day!*****




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
